item.title: Carl Icahn brings two directors to Caesarsâ€™ board. What could be next as the activist aims to build value
item.description: This isn't Carl Icahn's first foray at Caesars. He's bringing two directors to the board and a plan to maximize shareholder value.

item.title: Michigan nuclear plant shows the challenges the U.S. will face in safely restarting old reactors
item.description: The Palisades nuclear power plant aims to reopen in October, but the steam generators need major repairs that could delay the schedule.

item.title: Why this CIO is sounding the alarm on two key consumer bellwether stocks
